function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Health crisis and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High employee engagement and satisfaction levels may lead to complacency and reduced vigilance in maintaining health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the impact of employee initiatives and strategic plans on disease transmission risk within the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between employee engagement initiatives and health and safety protocols, leading to a compromised environment for disease transmission control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disengaged employees can impact on the guest experience and the business loses not only money but reputation as a result.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Talent turnover costs the business in both money and time.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through close contact among employees and guests","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on contagious disease prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for handling employee illness and isolation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hygiene measures in the workplace","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emotional support and engagement with employees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with legal and regulatory requirements","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of open and honest discussions about business realities and upcoming plans","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate employee engagement, learning, and development measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unplanned response to the pandemic impact on the organization","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of financial resources for community consolidation and access to information","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social protection for low-paid insecure workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of protective equipment for at-risk workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Antibiotic overuse leading to drug resistance and ineffective treatment of infectious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements and poor living conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health system vulnerability in regions with limited resources, affecting access to care and critical healthcare services.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate waste disposal posing biohazard risks, including potential transmission of covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges around space, water, and sanitation in informal settlements increasing the risk of covid-19 transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informal settlements are at risk of eviction, leading to increased vulnerability to covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control of covid-19 in informal settlements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perception of top-down control measures as oppressive","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ignored public health regulations in informal settlements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contested governance structures and plural leadership","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality and poverty leading to varied vulnerability profiles in informal settlements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigmatization and blame of residents of informal settlements","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor coordination between health authorities and urban stakeholders","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate access to water and sanitation in informal urban settlements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to social, political, and economic contexts influencing vulnerability to disease outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to basic services and public health interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and partnerships with local community structures and authorities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of formal data sources in informal settlements","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on online crowdsourced mapping","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and communication between data producers","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of affordable provision of water and safe sanitation in settlements","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Breakdown of support structures for vulnerable groups","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of predefined protocols for vulnerability in epidemic response","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mismanagement of deceased individuals leading to tension and resistance among local populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fatigue and wariness in local populations due to lack of engagement by external agencies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to provide specific guidance and protective equipment for essential workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate alternatives for mass religious gatherings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical distancing and isolation strategies in congested areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance and unrest due to externally imposed restrictions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community-led development practices may facilitate spread of covid-19 due to in-person contact with high-risk groups.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
